text.tspan: Marionette (or Puppet) begins at the Prize
Counter and stays there until his music stops
playing. He will be permanently active is he
manages to leave his box entirely.
Movement: Cam 11 to Cam 7 to Office.
Counter: Rewind his music box as often as you
can! If he leaves his box, try to get lucky and
survive until morning because you can't do
anything about him once he has left the box.
